definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cry, roar (NH id., cry (of raven); As. ṣarâḫu, cry aloud, Ar. s.araxa , Eth. s’arx: Targum [[חְרַח]] Aph. (of bear), Syr. s.rah. esp. Aph. and deriv.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. [[מַר חׂרֵחַ שָׁם גִּבּוֹר]] Zep 1:14 bitterly roareth there a hero, but abrupt in context and improb.; Gr (in part after LXX) conj. [[יִחְרַח כַּגִּבּוֹר]] ´[[קוֹל י]] (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַחְרִיחַ]] Is 42:13 utter a roar (of ´[[י]], going to battle; ‖[[יׇרִיעַ]]).
